title: Minesweeper (CSGO Edition)
content: One of my first little projects where I create the classic minesweepr game with some CSGO flavour.

title: Anzac Day Quiz
content: First project built with React built on ANZAC day. A simple 10 question long quiz that tracks your score throughout.

title: The Reactive Calculator (ios style)
content: One of the first javascript projects I tried a few months back and never finished. I knew I wanted to revisit it and had alot of fun on a Saturday afternoon.
